capabilities.name: Deliver Results
capabilities.description: Responsible for leading strategic planning and program design, ensuring efficient use of resources to achieve quality outcomes.

capabilities.name: Plan and Prioritise
capabilities.description: Coordinates cross-functional teams to assess priorities, delivery models, and resource needs for environmental programs.

capabilities.name: Think and Solve Problems
capabilities.description: Navigates complex and diverse inputs to bring clarity and direction to planning efforts.

capabilities.name: Demonstrate Accountability
capabilities.description: Ensures planning is grounded in robust governance, aligned with policy approaches, legislative and regulatory frameworks.

capabilities.name: Manage and Develop People
capabilities.description: Leads and motivates cross-functional teams, developing capability and potential in others.

capabilities.name: Inspire Direction and Purpose
capabilities.description: Communicates goals, priorities, and vision for environmental programs, recognising achievements.

capabilities.name: Optimise Business Outcomes
capabilities.description: Manages resources effectively, applying sound workforce planning principles.

capabilities.name: Manage Reform and Change
capabilities.description: Supports, promotes, and champions change, assisting others to engage with change in environmental management.

capabilities.name: Display Resilience and Courage
capabilities.description: Prepared to express views and accept and commit to change in environmental policy and management.

capabilities.name: Act with Integrity
capabilities.description: Adheres to public sector values in managing complex environmental programs.

capabilities.name: Manage Self
capabilities.description: Shows drive and motivation in leading environmental programs, with a commitment to learning and improvement.

capabilities.name: Value Diversity
capabilities.description: Shows respect for diverse backgrounds in engaging with community stakeholders and government agencies.

capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: Communicates complex concepts to a range of audiences, including executives and government partners.

capabilities.name: Commit to Customer Service
capabilities.description: Provides customer-centric services aligned with public service and organisational objectives in environmental management.

capabilities.name: Work Collaboratively
capabilities.description: Collaborates with government, legal, policy, and community stakeholders, valuing their contribution.

capabilities.name: Influence and Negotiate
capabilities.description: Gains consensus and commitment from regional government agencies, local councils, and community stakeholders.

capabilities.name: Project Management
capabilities.description: Applies effective planning, coordination, and control methods to environmental program management.

skills.name: Strategic Planning
skills.description: Leading the strategic planning and program design for environmental programs.

skills.name: Stakeholder Engagement
skills.description: Building strong relationships across government and with community stakeholders.

skills.name: Risk Management
skills.description: Managing risk and driving continuous improvement in program delivery.

skills.name: Governance and Compliance
skills.description: Ensuring planning and execution are grounded in robust governance and compliance with legislative frameworks.

generalRole.title: Environmental Program Management Executive
generalRole.description: This role involves leading strategic planning and program design for environmental programs, coordinating cross-functional teams, and managing stakeholder engagement to ensure sustainable and healthy environments.
